alert.note: Alert for Maryland Beaches (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued December 16 at 3:08AM EST until December 18 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM SUNDAY TO 4 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 8 to 13 feet expected in the surf zone. * WHERE...In Maryland, the Maryland Beaches. In Virginia, Accomack and Northampton Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Sunday to 4 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. OCEAN CITY INLET MD MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.0 FT, MODERATE 5.0 FT, MAJOR 6.0 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 2.5 FT, MAJOR 3.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/10 AM 2.9 0.4 0.4 1 NONE 16/10 PM 2.6 0.1 0.8 1 NONE 17/12 PM 3.8 1.3 1.4 1 NONE 17/11 PM 4.2 1.7 2.3 1 MINOR 18/11 AM 3.1 0.6 0.9 1 NONE 19/12 AM 1.8 -0.7 -0.1 1 NONE SAXIS VA MLLW CATEGORIES -
